iThemes: Premium WordPress Plugins Since 2008




Protect Your WordPress Website with the Best Security Available
Get iThemes Security, the most powerful and performant security solution for WordPress. Built with ease of use and performance in mind.
Download now, free!View Plans and Pricing





All the Essential Tools You Need ForAwesome WordPress Websites
WordPress is by far the best way to power a website, but it doesn’t come with everything you need out-of-the-box. You need a complete toolkit of all the most essential tools to take WordPress further. Since 2008, we’ve been building all the foundational tools for WordPress. From backups to security to site management, we want to be your one-stop shop for all the foundational tools for WordPress.




iThemes Security ProThe Best WordPress Security Plugin toSecure & Protect WordPress Buy Now


BackupBuddyThe WordPress Backup Plugin That’sSo Easy to UseBuy Now


iThemes SyncManage Multiple WordPress Sites From One Central DashboardBuy Now











“The Friendliest Support Team in the WordPress World“
We live, breathe, sleep, and eat WordPress. Sure, we have other interests and hobbies. And we love our family and friends. But we have one BIG thing in common: WordPress.  


Most Tickets Solved Within 1 HourAll iThemes subscriptions come with access to private, ticketed support.Visit the Help Desk


Our Mission is “Make People’s Lives Awesome”We strive to make life awesome for our families, team, and customers. Read our mission statement


30-Day Money-Back GuaranteeWe stand behind our products 100% with a 30-day refund policy.Learn More






Training and Community To Get You To Your Goals
Let’s Go Far Together!
“I subscribed to iThemes in March of 2018 and haven’t looked back. iThemes has given me the ability to efficiently and confidently offer a service that gives my clients peace of mind. I can properly care for my client’s sites and I can build a business with recurring revenue.”Tim EllisFounder & CEO,Sharpen Creative“I always use BackupBuddy and iThemes Security on every site we develop. Through iThemes, I’ve made such great connections to other web developers. Now I can get advice, a path to follow. I now have a process that someone has already refined for me.”Sue SpencerFounder, Spencer Web Design“BackupBuddy was the third premium WordPress plugin I bought over 10 years ago. It’s hands-down the easiest WordPress backup plugin to use, and makes deploying a live site pain-free. But the community is what keeps me coming back. iThemes Training with Nathan Ingram is worth its weight in gold. Melanie AdcockLead Web Designer/Developer,Adcock Creative Group
View Upcoming WebinarsView Free Webinar Library




WordPress Resources Worth Your Time
At iThemes, we’re tired of websites that don’t actually work to accomplish a goal, so we developed resources to help any website reach its full potential. From technical skills to helpful tutorials to weekly reports, we’ve got you covered.


WordPress Vulnerability ReportsEach week, we report newly-disclosed WordPress vulnerabilities.Subscribe to the report


#WPprosperUntangle thechaos, confusion,and clutter ofrunning a websiteto make money. Join WPprosper


50+ Free WordPress EbooksIncrease your knowledge of all things WordPress with our free ebook library.Download now


Free WordPress TutorialsTake advantage of these free WordPress tutorials to help you learn WordPress.Watch now


iThemes BlogGet all the latest WordPress news and updates from iThemes. Plus updates on new features.Read more

Vulnerable WordPress plugins and themes are the #1 reason WordPress sites get hacked, but keeping track of every new plugin and theme vulnerability is hard work. Get the weekly WordPress Vulnerability Report delivered right to your inbox to help keep your website secure.
